member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS
member.summary: Specifies the parameters for the input stream for a video decode operation.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.NumFrameArguments
member.summary: The count of frame parameters provided in the FrameArguments field. The maximum number of frame arguments is 10.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.FrameArguments
member.summary: An array of structures containing the parameters to decode a frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.ReferenceFrames
member.summary: A structure containing the reference frames needed to decode a frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.CompressedBitstream
member.summary: A structure representing the compressed bitstream in a single continuous buffer.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS.pHeap
member.summary: An representing a pointer to the heap for the current decode resolution.
